{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Lenovo |model=Newifi |revision=2 (D1) |series=AC1200 |asin= |est_release_date=05/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id=M01H094CT00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635EMI-10G |fla2=128 |fla2_brand=ESMT |fla2_model=F59L1G81MA-25T |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFMD4203;;2; |flags=MicroSD Card slot |tp_firmware=Padavan (unofficially),OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-AC1200 Dual-Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.newifi.com/product_newifi2_summary.shtml Product page] {{•}} [https://world.taobao.com/item/547008438849.htm Taobao page]
"CN51BRM", "M01H094CT00 LF" and "EWW509-A1-LO REV:015(XB)" :is silkscreened on the black board in the photos. {{See also|Lenovo Newifi mini|Foxconn}}
===Specifications=== * Product segment: AC1200 (867+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x dual-band internal antenna * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5GHz * Power Supply: : AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output : 12V with max. 2A current
===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 ''Lenovo Newifi D1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 2]]) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-team/d-team_newifi_d2 ''D-Team Newifi D2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 3]]) *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/howto/benchmark.openssl#benchmark_table_other_operating_systems Benchmarking results for the ''Newifi2 D1'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/20890 Jingdong]), :if this is the Newifi D1, [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 it would appear to be supported by OpenWrt] :''Newifi2 D1'' - [[MediaTek MT7621A]] (overclock to @1.2GHz) SoC :(MIPS 1004Kc V2.15), 796.67 BogoMIPS (595.96 on @880MHz) :FW by ''Padavan'': mod by hiboy (3.4.3.9), mod by bkye [https://github.com/bkye/rt-n56u/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards (D1, Y1S, Mini)]
===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-47024-1-1.html On '''KoolShare''' forum] :[[MediaTek]] MT7621AT, MT7603EN (2.4G N300), MT7612EN (5G AC866), :Flash 32/128MB, RAM 256MB，1x USB3.0, 1xUSB2.0, microSD Card slot *[http://www.newbandeng.com/thread-22532-1-1.html On '''NewBandEng''' forum] :[[Lenovo Newifi D1]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz Dual Core CPU :32MB SPI Flash, 256MB DDR3 RAM, 8GB MLC TF Card slot, :1x WAN, 2x LAN, 2x USB 2.0 (??), 2x 6TB HDD/SSD support *[http://bbs.mydigit.cn/read.php?tid=1664680 On '''MyDigit''' forum] *[http://bbs.newifi.com/thread-8-1-1.html On '''Newifi''' forum]
